projects.name: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce platform built with Next.js and Stripe integration for seamless online shopping experience.

projects.name: Task Management App
projects.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and team collaboration features.

projects.name: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: An interactive weather dashboard that provides real-time weather data, forecasts, and visualizations for multiple locations.

projects.name: Blog CMS
projects.description: A headless content management system for blogs with markdown support, SEO optimization, and admin dashboard.

projects.name: Portfolio Generator
projects.description: An automated portfolio generator that creates responsive portfolio websites from JSON configuration files.
